title: The Bounty Tank Interview: How Bounty Hunting Works, Becoming a Youtube Star & More
description:
Bounty Tank talks about the wildest stories that comes with his fascinating bounty hunter job! 

-----
00:00 Intro
0:30 - Tank on growing up in Cleveland, playing sports, avoiding the streets
3:45 - Getting attention from girls in nursing school, taking exams while drunk
5:18 - Discovering an opportunity to be a bounty hunter after college. Finding his first guy in one day
7:26 - Tank breaks down how being a bounty hunter and bail bondsman works
9:08 - Why bounty hunters are a good thing for society
11:46 - The “hunt” begins as soon as a person misses court
12:38 - Tank breaks down how he finds people who have skipped bond
13:50 - What happens if someone successfully avoids bond. The hunt never stops
15:46 - Tank breaks down his most difficult case ever chasing down a dealer with a $75K bond for 6 month
18:50 - Tank breaks down getting sh_t at in Detroit. How he learned that people don’t respect a badge
20:48 - Working with other bounty hunters
21:48 - How bounty hunters coordinate with sheriffs and local law enforcement
22:16 - Conflicts between cops and bounty hunters. Different laws in different cities and states. Cops not understanding the laws around bounty hunting
23:17 - Why Taylor vs Taintor gives bounty hunters the power to kick people’s doors in without a warrant
24:07 - People in the hood don’t see a difference between police and bounty hunters
25:23 - Living in the same city as people he’s arrested
26:47 - Reminding people that going to jail isn’t the end of the world
27:25 - Starting his career in 2012 and modeling his Youtube career as the urban Dog the Bounty Hunter
29:00 - Calling out fake Youtube bounty hunters that give viewers false expectations
33:40 - Being on call 24/7 while having a wife and daughter
35:32 - Being the number one bail bondsman in the city
38:15 - People are surprisingly willing to share information with Tank. Not revealing his real sources
39:12 - Being anti-v_olent and being passionate about not glorifying it. Influence of rap lyrics
44:13 - Making music, filming workout videos
44:45 - Adam fills Tank in on the Bounty Hunter Bloods in LA
46:18 - Passing up opportunities to catch people when it’s too dangerous
47:38 - Tanks says he would post a vlog if he ever had to k_ll someone on the job
48:44 - Tank says all cops should wear a body camera at all times
49:28 - Tank reacts to the PNB Rock situation, flaunting wealth
51:34 - Goals beyond Youtube: Sell the show to a network, break into acting, making music
52:33 - Toxic state of the music culture and rap beefs
55:28 - Why getting rid of cash bond is a bad idea and why society needs cops
58:00 - Arresting a guy that looks just like Adam

-----
NO JUMPER PATREON
http://www.patreon.com/nojumper
